definition[0]: an opinion, piece of information, result etc that is skewed is incorrect, especially because it has been affected by a particular thing or because you do not know all the facts
example[0]: The mediaâ€™s coverage of the election has been skewed from the very beginning.
definition[1]: something that is skewed is not straight and is higher on one side than the other
example[1]: The picture on the wall was slightly skewed.
